name: Verify that the GET method of Search API will be successful with all the valid parameters

statusMessage:
AssertionError: Expected link URL to start with 'https://int.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4', but got 'https://internal-dev.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4/Immunization?immunization.target=COVID&-immunization.target=COVID&patient.identifier=https%3A%2F%2Ffhir.nhs.uk%2FId%2Fnhs-number%7C9468049027&-date.from=2026-01-23&_include=Immunization%3Apatient'
assert False
 +  where False = <built-in method startswith of str object at 0x7fc3851b9bb0>('https://int.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4')
 +    where <built-in method startswith of str object at 0x7fc3851b9bb0> = 'https://internal-dev.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4/Immunization?immunization.target=COVID&-immuniz...ntifier=https%3A%2F%2Ffhir.nhs.uk%2FId%2Fnhs-number%7C9468049027&-date.from=2026-01-23&_include=Immunization%3Apatient'.startswith
 +      where 'https://internal-dev.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4/Immunization?immunization.target=COVID&-immuniz...ntifier=https%3A%2F%2Ffhir.nhs.uk%2FId%2Fnhs-number%7C9468049027&-date.from=2026-01-23&_include=Immunization%3Apatient' = Link(relation='self', url='https://internal-dev.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4/Immunization?immuniza...tifier=https%3A%2F%2Ffhir.nhs.uk%2FId%2Fnhs-number%7C9468049027&-date.from=2026-01-23&_include=Immunization%3Apatient').url
 +    and   'https://int.api.service.nhs.uk/immunisation-fhir-api/FHIR/R4' = <utilities.context.ScenarioContext object at 0x7fc38487ccd0>.baseUrl
